title: Cheesecloth Substitutes for Straining

items.name: Nut milk bag
items.details: Fine weave similar to cheesecloth, ideal for straining syrups and liquids.

items.name: Fine mesh strainer
items.details: Good for catching larger chunks; use in combination with a towel for finer straining.

items.name: Clean thin dish towel
items.details: Works well for straining. Hold over a strainer and wring out tightly.

items.name: Clean T-shirt
items.details: A clean cotton T-shirt can substitute when other options are unavailable.

items.name: Coffee filter
items.details: Can work but may be too thick/slow for some applications like syrups.

notes: Context was straining a pumpkin spice syrup to remove large chunks. Coffee filter was too thick for this purpose. Best options ranked: nut milk bag > fine mesh strainer > thin dish towel > T-shirt.
